uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui

Class MenuListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.MenuListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MenuListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Listener for menu bar in TillFrame that performs specific functions when menu items are clicked.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11)
    See Also:
    MenuEvent

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuListener

        public MenuListener(Till tillObject,
            DisplayBasePanel displayPan,
            InputBasePanel inputPan)
        Instantiates a new menu listener. Creates 'link' objects to Till data object, InputBasePanel and DisplayBasePanel
        Parameters:
        tillObject - The Till data object passed down from TillFrame
        displayPan - The object representing the base panel for the 'display' sub-panels
        inputPan - The object representing the base panel for the 'input' sub-panels

    • Method Detail

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Listener for actions from menu bar, to allow operations to be run when menu items are clicked.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        evt - - ActionEvent called from menu items in the menu bar that require an action to be performed.
